front.title: Comparison of RADIUS Against AAA Network Access Requirements

abstract.t: The AAA Working Group has completed a document that itemizes theirrequirements for Network Access Applications (NASREQ, Mobile IP, andROAMOPS). This document compares the current RADIUS protocol to theNetwork Access AAA Evaluation Criteria, and illustrates where and howRADIUS can be improved to become unconditionally compliant to theserequirements. This document is provided to the AAA Working Group asan official submission for an AAA protocol.
